with 4 years of experience and ranked in top 10 of peers Recognized for solving problems turning expectations into reality and leading multidisciplinary teams through creativity initiative and teams Successfully anticipated operational requirements effectively translated technical information to a diverse audience and improved quality of service for 3000 users in a hostile environment
